pageTitle: Permanent Mission of the Republic of Indonesia To the United Nations, WTO and Other International Organizations in Geneva

textBeforeTable: 7 April 2014         Deputy Secretary-General of UNCTAD         Petko Draganov (signed)         In keeping with our commitment to enhance communication efforts with member States by utilizing technological tools and timely information, I have the honour to transmit below the compendium of all current vacancies available at the professional and higher levels in UNCTAD. It is envisaged that the compendium of vacancies will be circulated on a regular basis provided that vacancies at the professional and higher levels are open.         These vacancies are published on the United Nations careers site Inspira http://careers.un.org. Please take careful note that only applications received through the Inspira site are considered valid. Each vacancy listed contains a link to the relevant posting in Inspira. This information will also be included in the delegates portal. Compendium of vacancies UNITED NATIONS CONFERENCE ON TRADE AND DEVELOPMENT
